name: Bluemix.info
description: Bluemix.info is a news aggregator for IBM Bluemix developers and professionals covering news about everything related to IBMs platform as a service, including runtimes, services, events and much more. Bluemix.info reads information from various sources via feeds. However curators need to approve content first before it shows up on Bluemix.info. Curators can also add entries manually. Find out why curation matters.
